Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. I understand that its true value might be subjective, but I believe it's worth more than just the sum of its parts. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for an exclusive price of $750000. I trust that you will appreciate its unique features and the investment it represents. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you would like to proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
